column2: Prefers to follow in othersâ€™ footsteps rather than initiate actions. Can be relied on to produce results as long as initial ideas are provided by others. Survival mechanisms are weak.
Enjoys challenge and action, becoming frustrated when no avenue for change exists. Expects others to rise to challenges as well.
Tends to flit from one pursuit to another, finding it challenging to settle down. Although change is welcomed, the stability needed to see projects through to completion is lacking.
Exhibits a marked aversion to change, while expecting others to demonstrate a similar reliability.
Finds it difficult to adapt to new situations and tends to be inflexible when faced with the demands of change or the needs of others.
May engage in procrastination and expects others to exhibit flexibility comparable to personal tendencies.
